summary: An Ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 2814 for the improvement of East Mercer Street, from Washington Boulevard to Thirty-sixth Avenue North, and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues; all in the City of Seattle, by paving the same with asphalt and other suitable material laid upon a proper concrete foundation, together with brick gutters, and providing for the necessary surface drainage, under Ordinance No. 33768, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
